channel.title: HELLP Ill stop posting@
channel.description:
ok i have the skill interface and when i make new acc its already 99 and its like not a stat how i make it so when i level or do ::master it will be 99 not 99 all the time help me please? i have the skill added like it works in quest tab but not the skill tab one :( =======Here is a pic ======= [size=24pt]Stat pic OK LOOK HERE I GET XP LEFT AND CRRENT XP Now i need to add it for my 2 skills i added to skill interface - and make it so when i level it will level there and not be 99 all time,[/size]
NEw user Account - = No Xp Shown Allways 99 :( i want it like BainScape! [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/28riop1.jpg[/img]
And when i do ::master = No Xp [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/vy86s8.jpg[/img] And if u can Help me add this Thanks add my msn - - Gavman2010@live.com
